website_summaries.verdict: A winning combination of a favorite character and a sought-after toy suitable for both boys and girls.
pros: Perfectly designed for smaller children, this little car has a solid body and an easy-to-use remote control with large buttons
Charmingly realistic interior has room for little figurine friends
A fun toy that children won't tire of in a hurry
cons: Requires batteries, and for extended play, we strongly recommend having extras on hand

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, however...
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy, but Mickey and Minnie mouse are on the same receivers. They should've had different codes because my twin grandchildren are always bumping into each others cars. the remote control works for both the Mickey & Minnie Mouse cars.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Cant use 2 cars, of different models at once. They all use the same frequncy.
customer_reviews.text: You can't buy more than one or you risk radio interference. I bought this mickey one and another different model for my daughter. Well, they all use the same unchangeable frequency so they cant play together. What a horrible design. Why make a mickey car if a minnie car cant drive beside it? Waste of money because my kids cant play together. I should've bought a different set you can find on Amazon that comes with two cars and different frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: RF frequency locked, multiples interfere with one another
customer_reviews.text: While the toy works fine be aware that these toys are RF not IR and there is no switch to change them between frequencies. This is a serious oversight in design since they will interfere with one another in groups. This goes for the other RC characters cars as well. As is stands, don't purchase online if you are getting multiples as you need to look at the physical box to verify the RF freqs are different.
customer_reviews.author: AKA Joker

customer_reviews.title: ehh id pass
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited about this toy my grandson loves mickey we opened it put the batteries in and he played with it for about 30 min before it died. They were brand new brand name batteries. I feel like it should have lasted longer like most of his other toys similar
customer_reviews.author: Kristy1004

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy more than one!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd read the other reviews before I purchased both the Mickey and the Minnie cars, thinking my daughters could play with them together. As others have mentioned, the remotes are on the same channel so they do not drive separately. One remote will take control of both cars. Ugh. If you only want one, though, they are cute and fun for little kids (preschool aged).
customer_reviews.author: E Will

customer_reviews.title: Love this control car for little one!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems with this car. Put batteries in gave control to son and watched Mickey Mouse take off. My three year old daughter loves this car..They fight over it. So I got my daughter a Strawberry Shortcake one for x-mas. I had no issues with this product and it still runs great after being dropped and fought over. Batteries don't last long so may want to keep back up batteries on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Cris P.

customer_reviews.title: To our disappointment this cannot be done as they run on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave two of my grandchildren these cars, hoping they could race them against each other. To our disappointment this cannot be done as they run on the same frequency and can only operate one car at a time. Defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Moss

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected
customer_reviews.text: Car functions as it should but is quirky. That's acceptable in the right situations/locations. I wish the remote antenna didn't have the small mouse ears which seem to draw my two year olds eye to put in her mouth. I'm afraid it will break off and be swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect remote toy for a 4 yr old boy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy, he could not stop playing with it! My daughter told me he ran around the house all day saying "thank YOU for the remote car gwampa lol!
customer_reviews.author: Passion for Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a minute
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this toy only works when it wants to. It would only work while spinning and going forward it would stop and go and then just not move at all. Yes I did change the batteries twice to make sure that wasn’t the problem, the toy is just junk unfortunately🙁
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: What the heck? It came used and tape on the side. I bought this with the purpose of it being new. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Within ten minutes it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift that did not last. Within ten minutes it started having issues with the car rolling on a hard floor surface. Hard to tell a child the gift they just opened is broken with in minutes of using. We also purchased the yellow car and its remote never worked. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The back wheel stopped working an hour after my son started playing with it. I tried my best to fix it, but it's unfixable!
customer_reviews.author: kevin lam

customer_reviews.title: Defective button on remote
customer_reviews.text: One of the buttons on the remote didn't work, so we ordered a replacement. The replacement arrived with the same problem. So we returned the replacement. Spoke with an Amazon rep and they help smooth out the wrinkles involved. . . Then we ordered the same product from Walmart.com and that one works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Family

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift for Any Kiddo Who Loves Mickey!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 2 y/o boy and he's addicted to it...it's super easy to use and perfect first toy for a radio controlled "car." The parents aren't too enthusiastic over the noise on their tile floors, but it gives their son hours, yes hours of entertainment!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson, he loves Mickey & remote control cars. He plays with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: julianscollections

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy 2 cause remotes work for both
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mickey and the minnie one and both remotes work for both cars so its a pain in the butt. Even does this when in seperate rooms. My kids keep arguing cause they think the other child is doing it in purpose. Very stressful so now they have to do it at seperate times with the other car turned off. Defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within weeks
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a present towards my sons sons first birthday. He loved it when it worked. I noticed that It couldn’t drive straight. Unfortunately it stopped working after two months.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My nearly 3 year old absolutely loves this little car. It only has two buttons to maneuver it but that is so appropriate for young children. If this gets damaged, I am sure I will be replacing it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Smathers

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: The Mickey car is so cute and easy to use. I purchased this Mickey R/C car for my son's third birthday. He loved it! It is small and easy for him to control. It spins in circles which gets my son giggling. There is a little bit of room in the car for him to add other small toys/characters for a "ride".
customer_reviews.author: Mommy3+

customer_reviews.title: Everything is on the same frequency, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for the holidays because we have the Minnie mouse car for my daughter and my son loves it. Unfortunately both cars are on the same frequency so we can't use both cars together. In fact one car doesn't work at all if they are both turned on and one remote controls the opposite car.
customer_reviews.author: tali

customer_reviews.title: Two buttons, Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for two year old cuz his older brother had a few RC vehicles that the 2yr old ain't allowed to touch... He's happy to have a RC car that he can play with!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect starter remote controlled car for your young ones. My son just loves that he can make something move and he isnt touching the actual car.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three year old granddaughter for her birthday she was ecstatic she loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse and Roadster.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My little nephew like it but he wish Mickey was able to come out Like that he could play with it but Otherwise it’s a cute car
customer_reviews.author: jennis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Got it November 1st. Stopped working December 1st. Not happy. Absolutely not worth $20. Into the garbage it goes.
customer_reviews.author: RockSteadyUSMC

customer_reviews.title: Also the batteries died pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as described. The car goes forward and backward, that's it, so for my very active 3 year old, this didn't hold his attention for very long. Also the batteries died pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it He handles it very well easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Brenda MarshallWright

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this, but unfortunately we didnt realize ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this, but unfortunately we didnt realize until we through the box away during the chaos of Christmas morning that the reverse function didnt work so we cant return 😔 He still gets a kick out of it, but it stinks that he just has to reposition it all of the time because he loses interest decently quick.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Halas

customer_reviews.title: JUNK.  returned.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is not a cheap knock off. The build quality was too poor for Disney to put it's name on it. The buttons on the remote rarely worked. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Wilson

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: i guess there is a reason this was cheaper than the other ones. it just doesn’t work that well
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed on behalf of Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in September for my daughter for Christmas. She played with it for a couple hours and suddenly it stopped working for no apparent reason. I changed the batteries and it was of no help. Amazon offered a 20% discount to keep the broken toy or I could mail it back for a new product. However, considering that I live in Trinidad neither option made any sense. Very disappointed on behalf of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna Smith

customer_reviews.title: Reviews
customer_reviews.text: If we can change this item! I know it’s too late!they can’t play together with the Minnie Mouse car due to frequency?? My grandson used it only 3 times. The battery was leaking.. hopefully, you can do something about it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Miss A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old loves it and is able to use it easily! Seller shipped super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fun cars for little ones
customer_reviews.text: These cars are adorable and my grandson and granddaughter love them. However, I bought two of these (Mickey and Minnie) and discovered that they are on the same frequency so it is very confusing when trying to control them!
customer_reviews.author: Critter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use however if you get two the remotes ...
customer_reviews.text: A hit with the kids! Easy to use however if you get two the remotes work the other cars. They are not on different frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Fun time
customer_reviews.text: It provide a few minutes of excitement. The kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute, but hard to control
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old enjoys playing with it, but has a hard time getting the car to turn, it’s hard for me. You just have to play with it without trying to go a certain way. The Mickey inside I really cute and it’s a fun little toy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little toy!
customer_reviews.text: The story was hard to find in the stores but found it at a competitive price on Amazon. I two-year-old grandson was thrilled with this gift. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Divello

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! Would be cuter if it had some noise/Mickey voice to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3-year-old son, and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Teddlie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use for my 2 yr old. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mickey is great
customer_reviews.text: My nephew just loves this product. He is such a Mickey fan. There are other characters on the box and he is already requesting them. I told him he can have them for his bday.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha Allen

customer_reviews.title: love turned to disappointment. ;(
customer_reviews.text: Toy was great for a while then just completely stopped working. :(
customer_reviews.author: T-Dog

customer_reviews.title: LOUD toy- 2 year old loves.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it. Easy to use. He loves he extra seat to put an additional passenger in. My reason for a 3 star is because it is LOUD! My daughter has a My Little Pony one and it is so quiet. This one is very loud when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but gets stuck easily
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well on tile but gets stuck frequently on very short pile carpet. Don't regret the purchase but wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Picard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect first remote control car
customer_reviews.text: Such a great starter car. Getting another one as it was so popular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, back wheels can hardly spin freely, tried multiple batteries and troubleshooting. Cheap product.

customer_reviews.title: the 2 yr old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: cute mickey mouse R/C car... the 2 yr old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne L Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: Put in brand new batteries! My granddaughter was so excited......Hit the remote button, it moved 2 inches and stopped. Checked to make sure batteries were put in correctly, and they were......car just wouldn't go! So much for this being a fun Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy! My toddler loves it! It keeps him entertained for more than 5 minutes so that's a winner in my book. The R/C range is a bit on the shorter side but it's okay, it just means you have to stay close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only one frequency
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my kids. Super bummed that they're on the same frequency & one remote controls both... led to lots of arguing in my house.
customer_reviews.author: kuch3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Having a lot of fun with this and easy for little hands to use

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: Remote control screws were stripped
customer_reviews.text: Could not remove the back of the remote to unscrew to put batteries in it,

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was scared to death of remote control cars at ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was scared to death of remote control cars at 4 years old - he loves Mickey and this one got him over his fear right away. He loves it and drives it around every day!
customer_reviews.author: C Braniff

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure if he was "ready" for a rite control car but this one is easy for him to operate
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this. I wasn't sure if he was "ready" for a rite control car but this one is easy for him to operate.

customer_reviews.title: Its great for my 3yr old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Its great for my 3yr old grandson..and only has 2 buttons so its easy for little ones to use

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first day :(. Back tire drug against fender and car wouldn’t go.

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My toddlers love it! I wish it did a little more than just circles.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My son got it for Christmas but the reverse button didn't work. Sent it back & got a new one. And the reverse button doesn't work on #2. Back it goes & we won't be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: These things are junk. I have gotten 2 and neither work. Dont bother contacting the toy company either because they will not respond.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: It is so wonderful and easy for my 2
customer_reviews.text: This was our christmas hit. It is so wonderful and easy for my 2.5 year old to use! Highly recommend. You do need 3 AAs and 2 AAAs batteries - which are not included!
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a total of maybe 2 minutes before it stopped working entirely.

customer_reviews.title: Remote control fails
customer_reviews.text: Remote control doesnt work very well. Otherwise is a beautiful toy.

customer_reviews.title: Goes a little bit slower than we would have liked - sucks the batteries dry in the car really ...
customer_reviews.text: Goes a little bit slower than we would have liked - sucks the batteries dry in the car really fast, but my son does like it. :)

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It worked for maybe 5 minutes then quit. We switched batteries and still won't work

customer_reviews.title: Just keep glueing it back on
customer_reviews.text: Great toy and easy for my 2 year old to use but the head came off very easily.

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great remote toy for a 4 yr old. Only problem, Mikey remote and Minnie remote work on same frequency.

customer_reviews.text: This prodruct broke from the first five minutes of playing with it.

customer_reviews.text: The remote control stopped working very quickly after receiving it. So now my son just plays with the Mickey car. Was disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old Grandson for Christmas and he loved it. His Mom said he was driving it all around the house!

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 3 year old nephew and he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old nephew and he loves this toy. Batteries not included so make sure you purchase those as well!

customer_reviews.title: Put in the batterie and NOTHING-doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Put in the batterie and NOTHING-doesn’t work. Awful pain in the neck now I have to be busy with returning it

customer_reviews.title: but besides that the toy is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Box was broken, but besides that the toy is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera

customer_reviews.title: Great gift,  simple toy,  lots of smiles.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a 2 year old, my son loves this car. It was a Christmas present and I was very satisfied that it was super simple for him. The only thing I didn't like was that to turn it uses a method that is always hard to get it where you want to go, but hey! He is happy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: JRod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable toy. Very simple, but fun for a 3 year-old's first RC.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryn  Morez

customer_reviews.title: So I would recommend this for older kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy and my nephew was excited to get it but he was turning two and had a difficult time with the controller. So I would recommend this for older kids. We had another issue with the getting the batteries placed into the controller and the base unit. Regardless if you decide to purchase this, make sure you have tools on hand to help get it out of the box and to put the batteries in. Overall I think think this is a fun toy for a Mickey fan!
customer_reviews.author: CNDENNIS

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work out of box! Was a Christmas gift for my toddler! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Dhinu Jayaseelan

customer_reviews.title: Car is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Car is easy to use. Would be 5 stars if it would drive on carpet. We have short carpet and it doesn't work well but it is great on hard floors.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Easy for under 2 to operate

customer_reviews.title: All my kids love this. The only down fall might be that ...
customer_reviews.text: All my kids love this. The only down fall might be that the batteries have ran out fairly fast but that may be due to my kids playing with it so much. Lol. They love playing run away from the baby as my 9 month old crawls to catch it. Lol definately worth the buy

customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for my 2.5 yr old. Easy to use and he loves it. I'm glad that I found it

customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get here but it arrived before Christmas so I dont mind. It's a nice car my daughter loves it and it's incredibly easy to steer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Jada Toys Disney Junior Mickey Mouse Clubhouse Roadster RC Car, 7" Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedTravel with Disney's Mickey Mouse in his super cool red Roaster as he goes sight seein? Cruise with Mickey to anywhere your imagination takes you!
feature_bullets: Simple functions that make the vehicle Easy to drive.
Three AA and two AAA alkaline batteries required (not included).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars415 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
